name: LUCIEN demo
description:
Lucien is a hack n slash RPG puzzle game 

following the story of napoleon a knight of the order of Wulfhelm discover the secrets of the castle and discover the bond with nature lost Millenia ago Fight against the corrupted forces of nature that have taken hold of your FORT (THIS IS STILL A DEMO AND NOT THE FINAL PRODUCT) Animations, 3d Modelling ,Environment Artist Cassandra Hite (@Sirghibli) Liam Wolfenden  Level Design, Gameplay, Programming, UI,  Liam Wolfenden Sound Effects Damien Mcewan Soundtracks Hunter Brown
